title: The game shut down itself, now i am punished for leaving the game!!!
body:
Today (13/12/2016) 15:40, i was in a game, playing Vayne as adc!
Around 15 mins, my game shut down itself, and I dont know why, i cannot even open the game.
So, i have to reboot the game, then it pop out, a new patch has been updated to solve the connection problem!!
And, obviously, my team lost the game, and I am punished!!!!

This is not seriously,  I was punished by the bug of the game?! 5 times low priority?!!!!
Your game engineer is eating shit?!

ANGRY!!!!!

replies.body: What do you mean by the game shut itself down?  Was there a bugsplat or some other error?  That certainly sounds frustrating, but [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will treat all leaves equally because it causes negative experiences for other players.  A leaverbuster penalty also occurs after multiple games, and not just one leave.  Let me know if you're still crashing with details, and I'd be happy to help with troubleshooting.
